title: showing folder hierarchy / subfolders?
creator: andreas110
content:
I have many levels of subfolders, e.g. main-folder "one" and "two". Below these main-folders I have subfolders "A" and "B" one -A -B two -A -B In Thunderbird Desktop, these can be collapsed and expanded

However in Thunderbird Android these are shown as one one-A one-B two two-A two-B in an flat structure, e.g. cannot be collapsed / expanded.

What do I wrong? BR Andreas
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:134.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/134.0;os:Android 14

title: Message preview
creator: roguebc1
content:
On the android I installed Thunderbird. when I go into the inbox, 1/3 screen shows email list.. 2/3 shows a message preview. I want to remove that preview. I only want to see my emails. I will click on an email if I want to read dit... IT would be fine if I could adjust the preview size but its set at 2/3 to 3/4 of my screen. leaving a tiny column for the emails.

Either adjust preview size, or remove it totally?

Please advise
